ARABIC: إِنَّمَا يَفْتَرِى ٱلْكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَٰذِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who do not have iman in Allah's Signs are merely inventing lies. It is they who are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They alone invent lies who do not believe in the words of God, and they are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It is not the Prophet who invents lies), it is rather those who do not believe in the signs of Allah who invent lies. They are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who do not believe in the miracles of God invent lies and they are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Only those who do not believe in Allah’s signs attribute lies and fabrications; and they themselves are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is only those who do not believe in Allah's Ayat who fabricate the falsehood, and it is they who are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Only they forge the lie who do not believe in Allah's communications, and these are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They only forge falsehood, who believe not in the signs of God, and those -- they are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Only they invent falsehood who believe not Allah's revelations, and (only) they are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Only those fabricate lies concerning God who do not believe in the signs of God, and these are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is only those who believe not in the signs of Allah who fabricate lie, and those! they are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Only those fabricate lies who do not believe in the signs of Allah, and it is they who are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is those who believe not in the Signs of Allah, that forge falsehood: it is they who lie!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is only those who believe not in the Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) of Allah, who fabricate falsehood, and it is they who are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: None forge lies except those who disbelieve the verses of Allah those, they are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is those who do not believe in God’s revelations who fabricate falsehood. These are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:105] Only those invent falsehood who do not believe in God’s signs, the Qur’an, by saying that these are the words of a human, and it is they who are the liars (the emphasis is [effected] by way of repetition; wa-inna, ‘and indeed’, and other [combinations of inna] are [used] in refutation of their saying, ‘You are just a fabricator’ [above, Q. 16:101]).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Only they invent falsehood) about Allah those (who believe not Allah's revelations) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an, (and (only) they are the liars) about Allah.
